narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Superior Senior Care is a Home Health provider based in Hot Springs, AR. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $22.5M in Medicaid payments across 446K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $22.5M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
